section.title: Skody AI APS: Your Production Navigator

bulletpoint.text: Skody AI APS is an AI-driven Advanced Planning and Scheduling software for manufacturers.
Automates and optimizes complex scheduling and constraints, adapts in real-time, and integrates with any ERP.
Enhances communication with real-time progress tracking.
